core.reverter

Class ActionReverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.reverter.ActionReverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddToBlockListReverter, AddToWishListReverter, ConfirmMeetingArrangementReverter, ConfirmMeetingOccurrenceReverter, DeleteFromBlockListReverter, DeleteFromWishListReverter, DenyTradeReverter, EditMeetingReverter, ItemRequestReverter, PrivateMessageReverter, RequestTradeReverter, SetCityReverter, SetPasswordReverter, SwitchOnVacationReverter

    public abstract class ActionReverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Reverts actions that can reasonably be undone. Since ActionReverter has to be serializable, it should only reference entities which are also serializable, but it cannot reference Managers. This means, upon creation, the ActionReverter should have all the data required to undo.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
